context: New method [frameLocator.owner()](/docs/api/class-framelocator#frame-locator-owner) converts a [FrameLocator](/docs/api/class-framelocator "FrameLocator") object to a [Locator](/docs/api/class-locator "Locator"). This can be useful when you have a [FrameLocator](/docs/api/class-framelocator "FrameLocator") object obtained somewhere, and later on would like to interact with the `iframe` element.
